programs.name: FMCSA Motor Carrier Safety Assistance Program (MCSAP-style)
programs.intended_scope: Commercial motor carrier safety and FMCSR enforcement.
programs.notes: Funds are intended to support enforcement activities relevant to commercial motor carriers and FMCSR compliance.

programs.name: Highway Safety / Section 402-style funding
programs.intended_scope: General highway safety programs including impaired driving, occupant safety, speed management.
programs.notes: Often used to support impaired driving enforcement, checkpoints, and public safety campaigns.

programs.name: Highway Safety Incentive / Section 405-style programs
programs.intended_scope: Incentive grants for priority safety areas (impaired driving, occupant protection, etc.).
programs.notes: States may be required to certify compliance with certain enforcement practices.

programs.name: Other federal or pass-through safety funds
programs.intended_scope: Other federal programs that may indirectly support traffic or safety enforcement.
